info.title: Field Design Package Documents Gathering API
info.description: API for gathering documents and drawings, like Damage Summary Drawing, Vendor Drawing, ISO Drawing, Tech spec etc. for an field design package

post.summary: Gather documents and drawings for the specified FDP
post.description: Send the FDP owner a plaintext URL that they can use to upload their pending documents. Also, return the tracking ID and status in plaintext.

parameters.name: FDPId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the open FDP

200.description: Collects FDP documents and drawings through a pending documents upload URL

documentUploadUrl.description: URL for the FDP owner to upload their pending documents

documentUploadTrackingId.description: Unique ID to track the status of the pending documents upload
